summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 CHEVROLET IMPALA. WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS BEING OPERATED ON THE FREEWAY, THE BRAKES LOST FUNCTIONALITY. AFTER THE FAILURE OCCURRED, THE SERVICE BRAKE ASSIST AND CHECK ENGINE WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. THE MUNDY CHEVROLET DEALER STATED THAT ALL RECALL REPAIRS HAD ALREADY BEEN PERFORMED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 70,000.
